data.text: Jisas bɨne anep umɨgan ak suk agek apel agak, Yad ke nɨbop agen, kɨcheki okok agyokɨl, binɨb tap tɨtay gak okok sek, mɨñak gak okok sek kɨlop gem, suŋ lɨnɨgab agak.

Pen bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb anep umɨgan anɨb ak, yɨb kɨli nɨm. Olap ned Saymon, yɨb nop Pita agelɨgɨpal. Olap Edlu, ne Pita nɨmam ne ak. Olap Jemis, ne Sepedi ñɨne. Olap Jon, ne Jemis nɨmam ne ak.
Olap Pilip. Olap Batolomyu. Olap Tomas. Olap Matyu, ne bɨ takis dep ak. Olap Jemis, ne Alpiyus ñɨne. Olap Tadiyus.
Olap Saymon, bɨ Selot agelɨgɨpal okok bɨ kɨli olap. Olap Judas Yiskaliyot, ne nɨm kɨdek Jisas nop mɨmug nɨgak.
Jisas bɨne anep umɨgan anɨb ak kɨlop takaw anɨb agak, Nɨbi binɨb Juda mel nab okok ma amnɨmɨb agak. Pen Samaliya binɨb taun kɨli okok mɨgan ayaŋ ma amnɨmɨb agak.
10.6 Jer 50.6, Mat 15.24 Nɨbi pen am binɨb Yislel jɨj ak kɨlop amnɨmɨb agak. Kɨli chag sipsip kul gep tek mɨdebal agak.
10.7 Mat 3.2, 4.17, Luk 10.9-11 10.7-15 Luk 10.4-12 Amnaknɨŋ, agñɨlɨg agɨnɨmɨb, God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab ñɨn ak, wulep mɨdeb agɨnɨmɨb agak.

10.8 Apo 20.33 Binɨb tap gup okok gem suŋ lɨl, binɨb pɨsnep kumub okok agem tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨl, binɨb soy ladek lup okok gem suŋ lɨl, binɨb kɨcheki abaŋ lup okok agyokem amnɨgel agak. Yad nɨbop kɨles pel yokɨp ñɨbin tek, nɨbi binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop yokɨp wog gɨñɨnɨmɨb agak.
10.9 Luk 10.4 Gol, silpa, mani tap okok dɨl dad ma amnɨmɨb agak.

10.10 Nam 18.31, Luk 10.7, 1 Ko 9.14, 1 Ti 5.18 Kanɨb amnɨgabɨm ñɨn ak, wad, chech omɨŋal, tob tɨlup, yɨl kodɨm tap okok, dad ma amnɨmɨb agak. Taynen? Bɨ wog gɨñɨbal okok, binɨb okok kɨlop pen tap ñel ñɨŋɨnɨgel agak. Anɨb ak tek, pen nɨbop abe tap ñel ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agak.
Pen taun akaŋ, man sɨkol olap amjakɨl, bɨ nɨbop agdɨnɨmuŋ tek olap pɨyow nɨŋɨd, ne ayɨp nep mɨdɨl, taun olap ke amnɨg nep nop kelɨgɨl amnɨmɨb agak.
10.12 Luk 10.5-6 Kal anɨb ak mɨgan ayaŋ amɨl, anɨb agɨnɨmɨb, God nɨbop kod yonɨmuŋ agɨnɨmɨb agak.

Binɨb kal anɨb ak nɨbop dɨl gɨtep genɨgel, nɨbi God nop agnɨgem, binɨb kal anɨb ak kɨlop kod mɨdtep gɨnɨmuŋ agak. Kɨli pen nɨbop ma dɨl gɨtep ma genɨgel, nɨbi God nop agnɨgem, kɨlop ma gɨtep gɨnɨmuŋ agak.

10.14 Apo 18.6 Pen bɨ an nɨbop ma agdɨl, takaw nɨbop ma nɨŋɨd dɨnɨmuŋ, nɨbi kal anɨb ak akaŋ taun anɨb ak kelɨg amnɨg, sɨlkul dayday tob nɨbop dup ak wik yokɨl amnɨmɨb agak.10.14 Jisas bɨne sɨlkul dayday tob kɨlop dup ak wik yokɨnɨgabal anɨb ak, binɨb taun anɨb ak kɨli ke nɨgɨnɨgabal, chɨn tap tɨmel gɨpun, anɨgɨl abal ey agɨnɨgabal. Buk Mak 6.11 abe nɨgɨnɨmɨb.

10.15 Stt 19.24-28, Mat 11.24, Jud 7 Yad nɨbop nɨŋɨd agebin, God kot awl gep ñɨn ak, taun Sodom taun Gomola binɨb tɨmel okok, kɨli mɨŋel dɨnɨgabal agak. Pen binɨb taun nɨbop ma dɨnɨgabal anɨb okok, mɨŋel awl yɨbɨl ak dɨnɨgabal agak.
Jisas takaw olap agak, Nɨgɨm. Yad nɨbop chag sipsip tek ak agyokebin, binɨb chen ladek tek mɨdebal nab okok agak. Anɨb ak gos nɨgtep gɨlɨg, kɨmɨgel gɨtep gɨl yenɨmɨb agak.

10.17 Mat 24.9 10.17-20 Mak 13.9-11, Luk 12.11-12, 21.12-15 Pen bɨ tɨmel ogɨnap nɨbop chɨchɨk dɨl, dam Juda bɨawl kɨli yelak okok kot gɨl, Juda apnan gɨpal kal ak dad amɨl nag dɨl nɨbop pakɨnɨgabal agak. Anɨb ak nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak.

10.18 Apo 25.23, 27.24 Pen yɨp yɨl mɨdebɨm tek, lɨpɨg gapman bɨawl okok sek, gapman bɨnonɨm okok sek yenɨgabal okok nɨbop dad amnɨgabal agak. Amel, takaw tep yad ak, bɨawl anɨb okok sek, bɨ Juda mel okok sek kɨlop agñɨnɨgabɨm agak.

10.19-20 Jon 14.26, 1 Ko 2.4 Pen nɨbop kot gɨnɨgabal anɨb ak, gos kuŋay ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Won anɨb ak owaknɨŋ, God ne nɨbop gos ñek takaw anɨb ak agɨnɨmɨb agak. Anɨb apin, Nap Kawnan ne ak nɨbop gos ñek, takaw anɨb ak nɨbi ke ma agɨnɨgabɨm, Nap Kawnan ne ak agɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb ak takaw tɨtay agɨnɨgun akaŋ, kɨlop pen takaw tay ak dɨl agɨnɨgun agɨl, gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak.

Pen nɨmam ogɨnap tɨkjakɨl, nɨmam ogɨnap kɨlop ñag lɨnɨgel agɨl, dam bɨawl okok kɨlop ñɨnɨgabal agak. Nap okok tɨkjakɨl, ñapay kɨli ke okok kɨlop ñag lɨnɨgel agɨl, dam bɨawl okok kɨlop ñɨnɨgabal agak. Ñapay okok tɨkjakɨl, nonɨm nap sɨkop kɨlop mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd, ñagɨnɨgel agɨl dam ñɨnɨgabal agak.

10.22 Mat 24.9, 24.13, Mak 13.13, Luk 21.17, Jon 15.18-21 Yad yɨl yenɨgabɨm tek nɨŋɨd, nɨbop mɨlɨk nɨgɨnɨgabal ak pen, binɨb an kɨles gɨl yad yɨl yenɨgab, mɨd dad amɨl ñɨn kɨdek ownɨgab ak, God nop tɨg asɨk dɨnɨgab agak.
10.23 Mat 16.28 Pen taun olap amem, nɨbop gɨ tɨmel genɨgel, taun olap pen pɨlɨk amnɨmɨb agak. Yad nɨbop nɨŋɨd agebin, Yislel binɨb kɨlop sayn yɨbɨl agñem amnaknɨŋ, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne ak ownɨgab agak.
Sikul binɨb olap am sikul agup won ak, tisa ne ak nop ma taw dap yap lup agak. Pen bɨ wog gɨñeb ak, ne bɨawl ne ak nop ma taw dap yap lup agak.

10.25 Mat 9.34, Mak 3.22, Luk 11.15 Anɨb ak tek, bɨ sikul okok kɨli bɨ tisa kɨli ak tek yenɨgabal, anɨb ak tep yɨbɨl agak. Pen bɨ wog gɨñeb okok kɨli bɨawl kɨli ak tek yenɨgabal, anɨb ak tep yɨbɨl agak. Bɨ kal nap nɨb yɨb nop Belsebul10.25 Yɨb Belsebul anɨb ak, Satan yɨb ne olap. apal ak tek, binɨb ne okok kɨlop yɨb tɨmel yɨbɨl ak lɨnɨgabal agak.

Jisas takaw olap agak, Pen takaw tay mɨñɨl yu gɨl mɨdeb ak, kɨdek mɨseŋ yenɨgab agak. Tap tay kɨmɨgel we gɨpal okok, kɨdek nɨgtep gɨnɨgabal agak. Anɨb ak binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop nɨŋɨd ma pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb agak.
Takaw nɨbop maynab ayaŋ apin okok, nɨbi subnab ak agɨnɨmɨb agak. Takaw kɨmɨgel kal mɨgan nepɨm okok, kal adek alaŋ amɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop agyɨkɨnɨmɨb agak.

10.28 Ais 8.12-13, Luk 12.4, Jem 4.12, 1 Pi 3.14 Nɨbi binɨb sɨj tɨmel pakɨpal okok kɨlop nɨŋɨd ma pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb agak. Kɨli yokɨp mubwak anep paklɨnɨgabal, kawnan ak sek gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgel tek ma lup agak. Pɨlɨkɨnɨg nɨm, Bɨawl ak ne binɨb kawnan ak sek, mubwak ak sek gɨ tɨmel gɨl, mab ke yɨneb dɨyokɨnɨgab ak nop pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb agak.
Chɨn nopun, yawl sɨkol okok, mani sɨkol sɨkol nep tawɨl won omɨŋal nep dɨpal agak. Yawl anɨb okok kɨli tap yokɨp ak pen, Bapi kɨlop nɨg mɨdeb ak, yokɨp ma yap pakɨpal agak.
10.30 Luk 21.18, Apo 27.34 Pen kɨmɨg wɨj nɨbop abe, God ne mɨdupsek ñɨn pagup anɨb ak, gos sek yenɨmɨb agak.
10.31 Mat 6.26, 12.12 Anɨb ak ma pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb agak. Nɨbi binɨb okok, binɨb yɨbɨl agak. Yawl sɨkol okok tek ma mɨdebɨm agak.

Jisas takaw olap agak, Anɨb ak binɨb an Jisas yɨl mɨdebin agɨl, binɨb mɨdebal nab ak takaw anɨb ak agyɨkɨnɨgab ak, nop pen yɨp yɨl mɨdeb agɨl, Bapi man ne alaŋ mɨdeb ak nop takaw anɨb ak agyɨkɨnɨgayn agak.
10.33 Mak 8.38, Luk 9.26, 2 Ti 2.12 Pen binɨb an Jisas yɨl ma mɨdebin agɨl, binɨb mɨdebal nab ak anɨb agɨnɨgab ak, nop pen yɨp yɨl ma mɨdeb agɨl, Bapi man ne alaŋ mɨdeb ak nop anɨb agɨnɨgayn agak.

Jisas takaw olap agak, Yad lum awl opin ak, binɨb kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨl dɨ jɨmñɨnɨg owup agɨl, gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Gos anɨb ak nɨgɨlɨg ma opin agak. Yad opin ak, binɨb okok gos adek keke nɨŋɨd penpen gɨnɨgel agɨl opin agak.

10.35-36 Mai 7.6 Anɨgɨpin tek, ñɨ ak tɨkjakɨl nap ne asɨk keke lɨl penpen gɨnɨgayl agak. Pen pay ak tɨkjakɨl nonɨm ne asɨk keke lɨl penpen gɨnɨgayl agak. Pen bin ak tɨkjakɨl, bɨne nonɨm ak asɨk keke lɨl penpen gɨnɨgayl agak.
10.36 Sng 41.9, 55.13 Anɨgɨnɨgabal anɨb ak, binbɨ ñapay kɨli ke yenɨgabal anɨb ak penpen pakɨnɨgabal agak.

Binɨb an nonɨm akaŋ nap akaŋ nop mapen awl lɨl, yɨp pen mapen sɨkol lɨl gup ak, binɨb yad tek ma lup agak. Binɨb an ñɨ akaŋ pay akaŋ nop mapen awl lɨl, yɨp pen mapen sɨkol lɨl gup ak, binɨb yad tek ma lup agak.
10.38 Mat 16.24, Mak 8.34, Luk 9.23, 17.33, Jon 12.25 Binɨb an mab bak kumak chɨn ak dad ajɨl, yɨp kɨdek ma gup ak, binɨb yad tek ma lup agak.

10.39 Mat 16.25, Mak 8.35, Luk 9.24, 17.33, Jon 12.25 Binɨb an ne ke mɨdɨl, mɨdtep gɨnɨgayn agɨnɨgab ak, kɨdek mɨd tɨmel gɨnɨgab agak. Pen binɨb yɨp dɨl, yɨp tap tay gɨnɨgab takaw ma mɨdeb agɨnɨgab ak, kɨdek mɨdtep gɨnɨgab agak.
Jisas takaw olap agak, Binɨb an nɨbop dup ak, nɨbop ke mel agak. Yɨp sek dup agak. Pen yɨp dup ak, yɨp nokom mel, bɨ yɨp agyokek ownek anop sek dup agak.

10.41 1 Kin 17.10, 2 Kin 4.8 Binɨb olap ne bɨ God gos ñek agñeb olap nop nɨŋɨd, dɨl dɨtep gɨnɨgab ak, God ne binɨb anɨb ak nop dɨtep gɨnɨgab agak. God ne bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok kɨlop tap teplep ñub tek, binɨb anɨb ak nop abe ñɨnɨgab agak. Binɨb olap ne bɨ teplep yɨbɨl olap nop nɨŋɨd, dɨl dɨtep gɨnɨgab ak, God ne binɨb anɨb ak nop dɨtep gɨnɨgab agak. God ne bɨ teplep yɨbɨl okok kɨlop tap teplep ñub tek, binɨb anɨb ak nop abe ñɨnɨgab agak.

10.42 Mat 18.5-6, 25.40, Mak 9.41, Hib 6.10 Pen yad nɨbop nɨŋɨd agebin, binɨb an bɨyad yɨb ma mɨdeb olap nop nɨŋɨd, Jisas bɨne mɨdeb agɨl ñɨg takɨl nop ñub ak, God nɨgek tep gek, tap teplep pen ñɨnɨgab agak.
